    • Field Detail

      • MIGRATION_RETRY_COUNT

        static final int MIGRATION_RETRY_COUNT
        Retry count for migration operations.

        Current Invocation mechanism retries first 5 invocations without pausing.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getPartition

        InternalPartition getPartition(int partitionId)
        Description copied from interface: IPartitionService
        Returns the IPartition for a given partition ID.

        If the owner of the partition is not set yet, it will trigger partition assignment.

        The IPartition for a given partition ID will never change, so the result can be cached safely.

        Specified by:
        getPartition in interface IPartitionService
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partition ID
        Returns:
        the IPartition

      • getPartition

        InternalPartition getPartition(int partitionId,
                               boolean triggerOwnerAssignment)
        Description copied from interface: IPartitionService
        Returns the IPartition for a given partition ID.

        If the owner of the partition is not set yet and triggerOwnerAssignment is true, it will trigger partition assignment.

        The IPartition for a given partition ID will never change, so the result can be cached safely.

        Specified by:
        getPartition in interface IPartitionService
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partition ID
        triggerOwnerAssignment - flag to trigger the partition assignment
        Returns:
        the IPartition

      • getInternalPartitions

        InternalPartition[] getInternalPartitions()

      • firstArrangement

        PartitionRuntimeState firstArrangement()
        Causes the partition table to be arranged and published to members if :
        • this instance has started
        • this instance is the master
        • the cluster is ClusterState.ACTIVE
        • if the partition table has not already been arranged
        • if there is no cluster membership change
        If this instance is not the master, it will trigger the master to assign the partitions.
        Returns:
        PartitionRuntimeState if this node is the master and the partition table is initialized
        Throws:
        HazelcastException - if the partition state generator failed to arrange the partitions
        See Also:
        PartitionStateManager.initializePartitionAssignments(java.util.Set)

      • createPartitionState

        PartitionRuntimeState createPartitionState()
        Creates the current partition runtime state. May return null if the node should fetch the most recent partition table (e.g. this node is a newly appointed master) or if the partition state manager is not initialized.
        Returns:
        the current partition state
        See Also:
        InternalPartitionServiceImpl.isFetchMostRecentPartitionTableTaskRequired(), FetchPartitionStateOperation, PartitionStateManager.isInitialized()

      • getPartitionReplicaVersionManager

        PartitionReplicaVersionManager getPartitionReplicaVersionManager()

      • createPartitionTableView

        PartitionTableView createPartitionTableView()

      • getMemberPartitionsIfAssigned

        List<Integer> getMemberPartitionsIfAssigned(Address target)
        Returns partition ID list assigned to given target if partitions are assigned when method is called. Does not trigger partition assignment otherwise.
        Returns:
        partition ID list assigned to given target if partitions are assigned already

      • getPartitionServiceProxy

        PartitionServiceProxy getPartitionServiceProxy()
        Returns the PartitionServiceProxy of the partition service..
        Returns:
        the PartitionServiceProxy
